    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Capacitors in series having different potential differences across them</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren in den Serien, die unterschiedliche
mögliche Unterschiede über ihnen haben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensateurs en série ayant différentes 
différences potentielles à travers elles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capacitores em série que têm diferenças 
potenciais diferentes através delas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condensatori in serie che ha loro differenze 
potenziali differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυκνωτές στη σειρά που έχει τις διαφορετικές πιθανές 
διαφορές σε τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensadores en las series que tienen diversas 
diferencias potenciales a través de ellas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when two capacitors are connected in series, they store the same charge but have different potential differences across them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential differences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wenn zwei 
Kondensatoren in der Reihe geschaltet werden, sie die gleiche Ladung 
speichern, aber hat unterschiedliche mögliche Unterschiede über 
ihnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand deux 
condensateurs sont reliés en série, ils enregistrent la même charge
mais a différentes différences potentielles à travers elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando dois 
capacitores são conectados em série, armazenam a mesma carga mas tem
diferenças potenciais diferentes através delas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando due 
condensatori sono collegati in serie, memorizzano la stessa carica ma 
ha loro differenze potenziali differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν συνδέονται 
δύο πυκνωτές στη σειρά, καταχωρούν την ίδια δαπάνη αλλά έχουν 
τις διαφορετικές πιθανές διαφορές σε τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando dos 
condensadores están conectados en serie, salvan la misma carga pero 
tiene diversas diferencias potenciales a través de ellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapazitanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren</string>
